message: Accept my generous offer and we can both walk away with a decent amount of money!
I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to give away the entire fortune!
I'm still confident I can get a better deal than this. Don't be stingy, Bob!
I'm still holding out for a better deal. You're not getting the better end of this deal yet!
I'm willing to meet you halfway, Bob. Let's split it 49-51 and be done with it!
